games.summary: DETROIT -- —Will Rileyscored 20 points,Sharife Cooperadded 18 and theWashington Wizardsupset the Eastern Conference-leadingDetroit Pistons126-117 on Thursday night. Justin ChampagnieandTristan Vukceviceach scored 14 points for Washington, which has won four of six since a nine-game losing streak.
blurbs: ⬆️ Anthony Gill (WSH) played 30 min (season avg: 6). 11 pts, 3 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Will Riley (WSH) played 29 min (season avg: 15). 20 pts, 6 reb, 5 ast.

games.summary: -- —Jalen Suggshad 15 points, 11 rebounds and 11 assists for his first career triple-double,Desmond Banescored 23 points andPaolo Bancheroadded 22 to lead theOrlando Magicto a 118-98 win over theBrooklyn Netson Thursday night. Egor Deminled the Nets with a career-high 26 points, shooting 6 of 10 from 3-point range.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jase Richardson (ORL) played 23 min (season avg: 12). 1 pts, 1 reb, 2 ast.
📋 Nolan Traore (BKN) made just his 5th start this season. 21 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: ATLANTA -- —Nickeil Alexander-Walkerbroke a tie on a short jumper with 1.3 seconds left and had 23 points in theAtlanta Hawks' 121-119 victory over theUtah Jazzon Thursday night. Newly acquiredJock Landalehad a season-high 29 points and hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 45 seconds.
blurbs: ⬆️ Cody Williams (UTAH) played 38 min (season avg: 19). 5 pts, 4 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Isaiah Collier (UTAH) played 48 min (season avg: 24). 25 pts, 7 reb, 11 ast.
⬆️ Ace Bailey (UTAH) played 40 min (season avg: 25). 20 pts, 6 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: TORONTO -- —Brandon Ingramscored 33 points,Immanuel Quickleyhad 24 and theToronto Raptorsbeat the new-lookChicago Bulls123-107 on Thursday night. Collin Murray-BoylesandSandro Mamukelashvilieach scored 17 points andScottie Barnesadded 13 as Toronto snapped a four-game losing streak against Chicago.
blurbs: ⬆️ Collin Murray-Boyles (TOR) played 37 min (season avg: 22). 17 pts, 5 reb, 4 ast.
⬆️ Ja'Kobe Walter (TOR) played 31 min (season avg: 18). 12 pts, 5 reb, 2 ast.
🆕 Anfernee Simons (CHI) made his first start of the season. 32 min, 22 pts.
📋 Jaden Ivey (CHI) made just his 3rd start this season. 13 pts, 4 reb.
⬆️ Guerschon Yabusele (CHI) played 33 min (season avg: 9). 15 pts, 11 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: HOUSTON -- — RookieKon Knueppelhad 24 points andLaMelo Balladded 20 to help theCharlotte Hornetsroll to a 109-99 victory over theHouston Rocketson Thursday night and extend their winning streak to eight games. DALLAS -- —Victor Wembanyamahad 29 points and 11 rebounds, and theSan Antonio Spursovercame rookie No. Flagg scored 32 points to extend his NBA record for consecutive games with at least 30 points by a teenager.
blurbs: ⬆️ Caleb Martin (DAL) played 32 min (season avg: 13). 8 pts, 4 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: PHOENIX -- —Pat Spencerscored a career-high 20 points,Gui Santosadded 18 and the shorthandedGolden State Warriorserased a 14-point deficit in the fourth quarter to beat thePhoenix Suns101-97 on Thursday night. Brooks led the Suns with 24 points.Grayson Allenhad 21.
